website_summaries.verdict: If you like the backpack design and numerous versatile pockets, it won't disappoint you – but the design and the price isn't for everyone, and others on our shortlist are just as functional.
pros: Sports 39 pockets in a backpack design made of rugged materials
The design is tall, making it capable of fitting longer tools
cons: Though the design is accommodating to many tools, getting access to them is more difficult than it is with standard bags

customer_reviews.title: I used to have high regard for Klein tools.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in May of 2016. It has lasted almost a year. Unfortunately, like the one before it, the zipper has failed. It will no longer stay closed regardless of which side I zip up.
customer_reviews.author: Washedupmiddleagedwhitedude

customer_reviews.title: Actually surprised.
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of room for your everyday tools. I'm able to fit 95% of what I use every day in it. It's super comfortable and the hard bottom is great for when you need to throw it down in damp/wet areas. Don't waste your money on some home depot bag/tool box, get this and save yourself some time. I do have to mention that you'll probably be made fun of on the jobsite and asked 100 times if you're going to school. I usually just tell them my clothes are inside to stay at their mom's house.
customer_reviews.author: AWR

customer_reviews.title: Zippers don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for less than a year, and the main zipper has blown out. The zipper on the smaller orange pouch is messed up as well. Otherwise the set up is good. This bag of mine is now useless. I have paid half the price for bags that have lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: jayden

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this one, I'm still an apprentice electrician and I can barely fit my most important tools I want with me at all times. The opening is just stupid too, you have to completely unzip it to get to tools towards the bottom of the bag, and the front just flops open onto the ground. After 6 months the zippers are getting messed up cause its such a thin bag and I have to cram stuff into it. Basically if you think you want a tool backpack go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toolbag, even if you're not an electrician.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work more to keep all my tools in once place. I am not an electrician, I work on PC's and network equipment. However, it accommodates the various screwdrivers and pliers I have along picks and brushes very well. I can even fit a rubber mallet and a voltage tester along with small cordless screwdriver/drill with no issues. Very solid and well built. I have not had any issues with the zippers as other reviewers have indicated. Beware if you are smaller and/or not very strong this thing is heavy even when empty.
customer_reviews.author: sundevil99

customer_reviews.title: Keep your tools protected and together...
customer_reviews.text: This pack is built to last and there is more than enough room for all of your tools to fit The only problem I have is taking some tools out to lighten the load. The rubber bottom works great to keep it upright and out of the dirt or mud and the zippers all move freely even under a heavy load. I can't think it anything that I dislike about it and I wish I had something like this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: the zipper now makes a more gradual turn and had a tab that keeps the zipper head in line better. That's a good company
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these tool bags for two years, and six months ago the zipper started coming apart. At the bottom, the zipper came to a right angle turn that wore it out over time. With the new one, Klein had fixed the problem, the zipper now makes a more gradual turn and had a tab that keeps the zipper head in line better. That's a good company, takes our feedback and makes improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles the Fert

customer_reviews.title: Good trades bag
customer_reviews.text: Good tool bag for HVAC, plumbing, electrical. Stays upright when open. Has a tape holder. Comfortable padding and straps. Looks professional. Could use some more loose inner space. Plan on only having 1 pair of glasses in the hard pocket. I keep all my SOMETIMES used tools in here and all my ALWAYS used tools in a belt pouch. Takes a strong individual to haul it around full of tools, very heavy duty tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a tackle box for my deep sea fishing gear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my salt water tackle. The rubber base does't absorb the odor like my soft sided tackle bag. It seemed like evey time I put my old bag on the boat floor it would come home smelling bad. I can't carry as much gear but at least I can stand the smell. By the way, you can pack a lot gear in this. Also, when you board the boat and both hands are full this is a back pack. You can wear it. It just makes boarding a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: blkbrd11

customer_reviews.title: Meh!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worked out of this bag for a year, and holy crap I hate it! There is zero flex, meaning you can't load it with anything except in the individual loops. If all you need are screwdrivers and a pair of side cutters, that's great. For a general technician bag, it is very difficult to work out of!!
customer_reviews.author: Clint W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I get about 1 year out of these bags, but I over load them significantly. Enough that safety made me unpack it because it was over 80lbs. Working 7-12s and a lot of tools, I got my money back. The zipper is what usually goes. I’ve only had one tear, but these are not meant to be run over by a extend-a-boom forklift when they are full of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton h

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an electrician and with this bag ge wouldn’t be able to fit all his power tools he’d use in a days work inside. And in addition to the it is super heavy so don’t get it if you need to wear it for long hours. I got a bag from Ross from a third of the price of this and then accidentally missed the cutoff to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vfk896

customer_reviews.title: All in all a very good choice
customer_reviews.text: So far qreat quality. Lightweight and zippers work nicely. Practical compartments and slots for some tools. It would be absolutely perfect if it were bigger for my items that I carry. I've cut the inside pocket flaps (tops) off as I just want the slots and no need to close the pocket. Also I pokes through a couple of small "screwdriver types slots so longer items can fit better. A couple of rings or slots on outside along edge would be nice to bungy or tie other items on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Handshy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality construction. It handles rugged conditions well. The hard bottom is nice in wet or damp areas. Side unzip enough to have both sides fold over to the ground, exposing all my tools without digging through it. Deep pockets. I do industrial maintenance for a living, and this does every thing I need it to. It holds a ton of crap!! Couldn't be happier, especially when I have to carry it long distances.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works great for electrician hand tools
customer_reviews.text: Works great for electrician hand tools. I was hoping it would hold up better for the price/brand (10 months). It caught on my tool box when I picked it up and tore all the stitching with no resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: I work in the HVAC industry in residential departments. I love that I can throw this on my back and still be able to carry other things with my hands. When going through a house to get into an attic, I don’t have to worry about slinging my tool bag around or bumping into stuff. I’ve had it for two months and still stands upright when 3/4 unzipped. No tears. Easy to clean. Only thing I don’t like is I wish it had more exterior smaller pockets for organization. Plenty inside for bigger tools but just for bits and such. Other than that, it was a great investment and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its Overal Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a plumbing background and wanted a tool bag to use around my property and when friends need help with something/Side Jobs. This bag is so durable I feel I could take it to war and beat the crap out of it. Extremely durable! I love this bag! I wouldn't say its just for electricians for I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a technician. It holds all the tools I need to get through the day. Very durable and makes it easy to carry 20+ lbs of tools on the shoulders. Only beef I have is that if you put to much tools on one side, it will tilt so it has to be even at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Roque

customer_reviews.title: Has done a great job of holding a lot of tools for going ...
customer_reviews.text: Has done a great job of holding a lot of tools for going on almost 4 months. Is heavy to carry around but much easier than carrying multiple tool boxes. I keep adding tools and it is actually getting to be too small for my needs but is holding strong and doing wonderfully. Plenty of pockets and enough space for 2 drills, 3 batteries, more pliers than I really want but for which are necessary for my job and a number of screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tool bag I own
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. I have one for every employee because it works well. The inside is well organized with plenty of space for every tool you can imagine. As it is a sealed backpack we can walk into buildings without security even noticing what we are there. The straps are adjustable and fit everything from 5'6 160 lb to 6'4" 240lb individuals.
customer_reviews.author: A. Renck

customer_reviews.title: Im enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.text: The only gripe is the smaller pockets sometime doesnt Zip properly. The tracks get kinda wonky. But its Klein so its durable and you can tell its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first received this backpack. It didn't loom like I would hold all the tools I need to carry with me in my daily struggle as a school maintenance person. It actually holds more than my last toolbag and is easier to climb ladders with both hands free. Seems durable as I have had it for 2 months now. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack to Organize Tools
customer_reviews.text: Built for organization so when you put your tools in correctly they are easy to access. Only need to carry one bag, although it is a bit heavy. Using this for electrical tools on remodeling jobs because it provides ease of grabbing one bag when working in condo buildings. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: LHP

customer_reviews.title: Great Klein quality like always!
customer_reviews.text: So I do a bunch of traveling and got tired of lugging a large bag I have to hold all the time. I bought this so it I could lug it around easier more convenient. I have to say I love the bag I have it loaded down and hasn’t had any tears or any wear! Will say only down side any drills you have won’t fit really with out just cramming them in there or having no other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband!
customer_reviews.text: This was a home run when it comes to gifts for my husband! He absolutely loved this!! It’s sturdy, it’s holds a lot of tools and it’s easy to tote around!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: That's why I love this sleek clam shell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not into the oversize backpack with a bunch of pockets. That's why I love this sleek clam shell, it holds all the tools I need to do my job. The straps have a nice layer of soft padding its comfortable on your shoulders. I would around different contractors that are in different fields of work then me that have this backpack and they also said they love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Jamersun

customer_reviews.title: fantastic bag
customer_reviews.text: loving this 🎒... i have it loaded very heavy and it feels confortable when slinging it on my back. I a Jack of all trails. So I need a huge mix if tools.
customer_reviews.author: Texpuppet

customer_reviews.title: HVAC recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Heat tool backpack, I'd say this is the best on the market at this affordable pricerange. They do make 250$ bags that are more durable. But this is by far is an amazing starter bag. Ive had mine for 4months and it's great shape. My coworkers got the same bag, had his for 7months and his still looks great too. The shell on the bottom is the reason everyine should get this bag over the similar ones. all the other bags will roll over or fall over. Least with this bag it's a portable work station wherever your go. Just unzip and lays out flat. Or keep half zipped and keep your backpack from ever getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the purchase of this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the purchase of this backpack. The quality of performance and materials does not raise doubts that the backpack will last long. Pockets for the instrument are very thoughtful. In a word, if you do not want to think about how and how to carry your tool to work, buy this backpack, you will not lose it!
customer_reviews.author: Mionnix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toolbag, it allows me the organization my OCD ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toolbag, it allows me the organization my OCD brain needs, plenty of pockets for all kinds and sizes of tools, big pocket for spare parts but the durabilty is off the charts AMAZING the molded plastic/rubber bottom keeps it upright and can handle every terrain I work in... it allows me to safely climb ladders and stairs instead of lugging all the tools up in bags carried by hand taking away my ability to grab anything to steady or balance myself on a ladder I could go on and on about how much I love this bag but honestly you should buy one yourself and see what I mean. Best bag I've ever owned!! GET ONE
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I looks good and looks professional
customer_reviews.text: I work as an Appliance technician and this bag holds everything I need to do a job. I carry it in on strap on my shoulder and it is not overly heavy. I hang it in my truck between calls on the handles. I looks good and looks professional. The soft bottom is excellent to prevent damage to any hard wood floors and there is a pocket for every tool. I never have to look for a tool and can grab a tool out of the bag with my head under/in and appliance. I know exactly where it is every time.
customer_reviews.author: McVaugh

customer_reviews.title: Rugged!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 2nd bag now. The 1st one lasted almost 3 years of constant daily use in the HVAC trade. I carried a tool belt for years and I can't believe how much the switch changed my performance. I carry a good 35 lbs in tools and I feel that most everything I want during a service call is now on hand. I wish the bag came with some way to hook the bag on a door or pipe and had a built in strap to hold the opposite side at 90o. I'm getting old and I hate bending over constantly to get my tools. Rugged bag with plenty of compartments and slots for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a great tool bag. Never used it though. When I removed it from the packaging the bag empty is as heavy as my electricians bag loaded with tools. I was planning on spreading the weight of my existing tool bag over both shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Bullhead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack I've had it over a month now. Its compact and and keeps tools very organized. Only down side is no room for a drill. I just put the battery in the bag and use the strap on the side to hang my drill
customer_reviews.author: CaSandra Flores

customer_reviews.title: I love Klein tools. A bit pricey but I like how the chicks dig it
customer_reviews.text: I love Klein tools. A bit pricey but I like how it Well it keeps tools organized and in place. The chicks dig a man’s tool.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My Hubby needed this to carry his tools for when he has to work on a crane. Not too bulky for climbing up the crane. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag. I am a Jr Field Tech for an electrical company and this holds all my tools and is easy to carry on job sites. Hard pocket is great for protecting my meter.
customer_reviews.author: RLL

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this dud of a design
customer_reviews.text: The internal pockets could have been arranged better. The zippers never want to zip back up and it always falls over even though it was suppose to be designed to stand upright.
customer_reviews.author: eddiealex

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as good as the other Klein tool bags
customer_reviews.text: Straps fell off within 2 months. Definitely not as good as the other Klein tool bags. My husband is an electrician and only uses Klein, so we were disappointed with this
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Webb

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Tough! My concern is the zippers. However if these bust open, it means your packing to much.
customer_reviews.author: NO

customer_reviews.title: A must try
customer_reviews.text: He LOVED this . Just started a new job after G.P in Arkansas shut down and hes had compliments on top of its uses. It's a must try. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The bag is awsome! The only down side is the tape strap ripped off like 2 weeks after i bought it. Then the shoulder strap buckle is plastic. It just cracked off when i was carrying it. So i had to sew the strap back on the bag
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: over priced. no room to get it closed if you utilize all the pockets
customer_reviews.author: DonnyDoom

customer_reviews.title: Get an 8" wheel box from them instead
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY heavy by itself If tools are added into the backpack the all thing is almost impossible to carry around I ended up getting a tool box on the 8" wheels from the same guys ... LOVING THE BOX
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! Edit, 1yr later: I've had this bag with me every day for work filled to the absolute brim with my small tools and sets/ disposables and it doesn't even show signs of wear yet! Absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool backpack
customer_reviews.text: Lowe it. Good quality tool back pack. Plenty of pockets for my tools. Special pockets for multi meters and drill bit cases.
customer_reviews.author: Ikrom

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, tough and well made
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but worth it if you use everyday like me. Good tough bag with lots of storage space and pockets. Depth could be bette run some of the pockets, but overall very good bag with lots of bells and whistles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything including zipper does seem like it will hold up
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking this bag so far. This is a time will tell product for me. It definitely feels well made and tough. My concern is how long will the zipper last. Everything including zipper does seem like it will hold up, but I'll give it a year before I decide.
customer_reviews.author: Mhill

customer_reviews.title: Durable. And while standing up bag wont get wet. 😄
customer_reviews.text: Bag is super tough! Extra comfy on shoulders when loaded down with mad weight from my tools. Saves my hands big time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kyle fields

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, well made backpack. Room for lots of hand tools
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Study bag but a bit heavy when empty
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to carry my everyday tools for hvac, I didn't feel like I had enough space. Not to mention the bag has some heft to it when it's empty, which means you're gonna feel that extra weight when you've got tools in it and have to walk for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter for her Christmas hopefully she will love it for her job, just what she needs
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like it. Only complaint is it is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He seems to like it. Only complaint is it is a little heavy on its own so you definitely have to keep your self from overloading it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kline Tools backpack
customer_reviews.text: Solid tool bag and makes it easy to carry and quickly locate essential tools. Best for service calls or climbing ladders/scaffolding.
customer_reviews.author: GOPACKGO!XLV

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, plenty of pockets and holds up to lots of weight. have been using daily for over 6 months now still in like new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C

customer_reviews.title: Good organize tools backpack not enough space for big tools drills
customer_reviews.text: Great quality great organized tool backpack no space enough for drills I purchase this product and I ending returning back I’m disappointed with the space for drills not enough
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto salazar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool bag. Has lots of room. Very sturdy and is comfortable to carry on my back. I’m in construction so sometimes have to go to several job sites. This helps carting to around so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: A great work back pack
customer_reviews.text: Works for me for the price, holds all of the tools I need for my job.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my BF, he kept talking about what a great bag it is. It actually is a nice sturdy bag with alot of attention to detail. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool bag. Was looking for something to carry my tools as I can't wear a pouch any more and this backpack filled the bill. I was able to get all my tools from my pouch and tool back in the backpack and can either carry it or wear it on my back if I need my hands free. Well made it looks like it will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Squires

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: i just started my house call dog grooming business and this is exactly what i needed to carry about all my tools to groom dogs. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only tool bag you should buy.
customer_reviews.text: Come on it Klein Tools...enough said. I'm a elevator mechanic. I cary this everyday and its perfect. Dont waste your money on any other bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag over all. Just a few quirks; a little smaller than I anticipated, make sure you balance your tools on either side of the bag or it will tip over into that puddle you set it next to. No major cons. Pros: slim enough for me and it on my back to go up the caged ladder up to the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Durability is not there.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag I've bought I the past 2 years. The first bag I bought the zipper busted on me. My 2nd bag I bought which was back in June of this year. One of the straps came apart....i literally only have about 25 pounds max of tooling in it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Just as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, i got this for my boyfriend who climbs cell phone towers, its sturdy and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Really can’t say anything good or bad about the bag but they advertised it as one bag and sent something totally different. I returned it and bought the Rugged tool backpack which I love.
customer_reviews.author: brian a.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not a veto pro
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Def missed the bet with a hook on the outside for a impact/drill. Has everything i can need mostly. Zipper will fail first. Hasnt yet 3 months of service work.
customer_reviews.author: Ak cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Zippers broken after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Owned this backpack for less then a lear and both front and back zippers broke. Most definitely not worth the money. Made is China what can you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks nice, too
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. My boyfriend got it because his old tool bag made him lean when he carried it and hurt his back. Now he can toss this on and have two free hands
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: holds everything nd more, i am an industrial electrician, i do maintenance, this pack is such a help...good price, it is so handy!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dub

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It could use a padded pocket for tablet/laptop storage. Only stands up on it's own when closed, which makes it awkward to remove tools unless it is fully opened.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying your tools
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for what I needed! Much easier to carry tools in backpack instead of tool box!
customer_reviews.author: Rychewoman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a tool box. I compared many similar to this before buying and am confident that this is the best choice for electricians, screwdriver slots with some depth was the bright spot for me, and this has plenty. The hard shell top compartment is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: vj1865

customer_reviews.title: built to last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who is a property manager and does all the renovations for his company. He has really enjoyed keeping the daily use tools in here so they are handy and easily accessible. He has used it daily for about 9 months and the bag (Although dirty!) has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in electrician’s union. He loves it. Good quality. Roomy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built tough
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Stands up on it's own and has the perfect pockets for my tools. Best part is the sturdy glasses holder at the top of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please redesign this bag Klein.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag. Base is too small and slots are so tight to place tools I ended up sticking them in upside down so now the bag became top heavy. I ended up laying the long tools at the bottom which was why I bought the bag to avoid that habit in the first place. Loved the colors and the quality but please modify the inside design.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca14

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bag. I didn’t think it would be able to hold all my tools. It does and I still have room for more. Well made, tough and durable
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Frees up hands to carry additional items.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, tools stay organized and easily found/located in tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: FlyinB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. So far it works great
customer_reviews.author: Dom22

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for christmas as he is an electrician. He loves it ! It's very sturdy and he likes the bottom design as it stays standing upright when you set it down. Great product for the money also.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Lajeunesse

customer_reviews.title: Good Product! Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good Product! Great Quality! Must Have For HVAC - Carries All My Tools & MORE! Comfy Too! Super Fast Shipping - THANKS AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for work. He likes it a lot. It’s so much easier for him to carry his tools around. Great quality back back. And the price is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen_culich

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect! The only thing this backpack is missing
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect! The only thing this backpack is missing, is a long flat separate pocket somewhere to put in a file folder for estimates or invoices. Other than that, I have been very happy with this backpack. I have used it everyday for almost 3 months and there are no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: RFW

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this back pack only gave a 4 star on durability because haven't had it long enough to test. But for now it is an awesome bag. Heavy but that's on me I like to have what I need without countless trips to the van. Best bag I have owned in 25 years
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: IS PERFECT FOR MY HUSBAND'S TYPE OF WORK ALL THE TOOLS FIT PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Samos Guardia

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to hard use
customer_reviews.text: Great tool bag. My husband had the original version and has loved it. We did choose to return this bag for the newer larger version, but the comparable original bag was well beaten and worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Other guys I work with use the V-Tech bag and it functions a lot better. Any company can throw a backpack together and ...
customer_reviews.text: Design flaws hold this bag back a lot. It is fairly heavy duty and can withstand the weight and being toss around but whenever I open the bag up to get tools it needs to be laying down. Does not allow for quick access to tools. Other guys I work with use the V-Tech bag and it functions a lot better. Any company can throw a backpack together and throw some pockets in it and that's what this product truly is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tradesmen!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for my brother who is an electrician! He has to have several tools on him on the job and having a backpack to carry a lot of his tools along with having free hands to carry other items is a huge help for him! Definitely recommend if you or a loved one work in a field where you need to transport a lot of tools daily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Using for daily use with oil and harsh chemical present. Bag kept its integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Quade Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for storing and transporting tools without the mess ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for storing and transporting tools without the mess and clutter of a traditional tool bag. Easy to find any tool you need in a timely manner. Tool pockets seem very sturdy and the base is strong. Fits comfortably on your back without the strain from carrying a bag on your shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. A lot of room for an electrician. Sturdy bag, actually stiff when you first get it. Plenty of room for regular use tools.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for anyone who has to carry around a lot of tools. I bought this bag because I was working at a hotel being built and the closest parking was a 10 min walk away so it helped with bringing my tools back and fourth to work everyday
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and fits all of the tools of the trade.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love the backpack. I’m an IBEW electrician and am currently working in a large industrial facility where my job site may be some distance from the set up and it works great packing my tools in across the plant leaving my hands free to carry materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for field technicians
customer_reviews.text: This bag is probably the best one out there because it fillets right open. I work as a field technician and use it every day. I can fit all the tools I need. Been using it for two years now and it’s holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack that is out of production. So buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Answer to all your problems. Comfortable to wear, even when filled up with all your tools. Rubber bottom is rugged and can handle what you throw at it. Dont go to work without it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Madrid

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: works, just wish the front top crush pouch was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Caime

customer_reviews.title: No room for drill
customer_reviews.text: No room for drill or anything else not going in pocket
customer_reviews.author: teckalex

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe how much this holds.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson needed for work. This handles everything needed for his job. So sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: luckylady2345

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is great overall, Really use it for the extra tools and batteries. Overall it’s sturdy and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: Klein Tools 55421BP-14 Tool Bag Backpack, Heavy Duty Tradesman Pro Tool Organizer / Tool Carrier with 39 Pockets and Molded Base
product_meta.description: Klein Tools' Tradesman Pro Organizer Backpack features 39 pockets for plenty of tool storage, including a hard, molded front pocket for safety glasses and a front zipper pocket to store loose parts. The bright orange interior will help you find your tools faster. The durable molded base protects from the elements and is water resistant. Backpack measures 20-Inch x 14.5-Inch x 7.25-Inch. Tool Backpack with 39 pockets to offer ample space for storage. 1680D ballistic weave construction with fully molded bottom. Orange interior for easy tool visibility. 1680d ballistic weave for durability and water resistance. Shoulder straps with extra padding and handles for easy carrying. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.
feature_bullets: Tool Backpack with 39 pockets for tons of tool storage
Hard, molded front pocket protects safety glasses
Front zipper pocket for small parts and tools
Taller bag and interior pockets allow for long screwdrivers
Fully molded bottom protects from the elements
